  5. Opinion | AI Is Reshaping Student Writing, Not Replacing It  Mississippi Free Press

item.title: Netflix uses AI effects for first time to cut costs - BBC
item.description:
1. Netflix uses AI effects for first time to cut costs  BBC
  2. AI-Generated Content on Netflix Is Already Here  CNET
  3. Netflix starts using GenAI in its shows and films  TechCrunch
  4. Netflix Is Using Startup Runway AI's Video Tools for Production  Bloomberg
  5. Netflix’s Ted Sarandos Says AI Will Make Movies and TV “Better, Not Just Cheaper”  The Hollywood Reporter
